item.title: Robots and Aritificial Intelligence
item.description: IGM FORUM 1 IGM FORUM 2 Daron Acemoglu & Pascual Restrepo, 2017. “Robots and Jobs: Evidence from US Labor Markets,” NBER Working Papers 23285, National Bureau of Economic Research, Inc. Aghion, Philippe and Howitt, Peter, 1994, Growth and Unemployment, Review of Economic Studies, 61, issue 3, p. 477-494. Joseph Zeira, 1998. “Workers, Machines, and Economic Growth,” The Quarterly Journal of Economics, Oxford University Press, vol. 113(4), pages 1091-1117. David H.
